DOC.brief_summary: 6-week , single site , two parallel arm , randomize , control trial compare effectiveness High Intensity Interval Training ( HIIT ) versus continuous Moderate Intensity Training ( MIT ) program cardiovascular metabolic health outcome overweight adolescent male . HIIT training may potent time-efficient strategy induce similar metabolic cardiovascular adaptation typically associate MIT .
DOC.brief_title: High Intensity Interval Versus Continuous Moderate Intensity Training : Maximizing Benefits Exercise Overweight Adolescents
DOC.criteria: Ages 1722 Men BMI ( 25.0 35.0 kg/m2 ) Interested improve health fitness Weight loss gain > 10 % body weight past 6 month reason . Currently take medication suppresses stimulate appetite . History prior surgical procedure weight control liposuction . Current smoker . Any major disease , include : Active cancer cancer require treatment past 2 year ( except nonmelanoma skin cancer ) . Active chronic infection , include selfreported HIV positivity active tuberculosis . Diagnosed heart condition . Uncontrolled hypertension : systolic blood pressure 160 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure 95 mm Hg treatment . Gastrointestinal disease , include selfreported chronic hepatitis cirrhosis , episode alcoholic hepatitis alcoholic pancreatitis within past year , inflammatory bowel disease require treatment past year , recent significant abdominal surgery ( e.g. , gastrectomy ) . Asthma . Diagnosed diabetes ( type 1 2 ) , fast impaired glucose tolerance ( blood glucose 118 mg/dL ) , use antidiabetic medication . Conditions behavior likely effect conduct trial : unable unwilling give inform consent ; unable communicate pertinent clinic staff ; unwilling accept treatment assignment randomization ; current anticipated participation another intervention research project would interfere intervention offer trial ; likely move away participate clinic trial complete ; unable walk 0.25 mile 10 minute . Currently take antidepressant , steroid , thyroid medication , unless dosage stable ( change 6 month ) . Any active use illegal illicit drug . Excessive alcohol intake define average consumption 3 alcohol contain beverage daily . Unwilling limit alcohol intake ≤2 drink per day ( one drink = 4 oz . wine , 12 oz . beer , ½ shot liquor ) . Current exerciser ( > 30 min organize exercise per week ) . Indication unsuitability current health exercise protocol ( PARQ ) . Any condition , opinion investigator , would adversely affect conduct trial .
